Uses of Interface
com.davidbracewell.stream.StreamingContext

  • Packages that use StreamingContext 
    Package Description
    com.davidbracewell.stream
    A unified stream interface that can work across Java and Spark streams.

    • Uses of StreamingContext in com.davidbracewell.stream

      Classes in com.davidbracewell.stream that implement StreamingContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocalStreamingContext
      Represents a local streaming context using Java's built-in streams
      class  SparkStreamingContext
      Represents a distributed streaming context using Sparks's rdd classes
